Uses of Class
de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.urlresolution.ViewerPath

  • Packages that use ViewerPath 
    Package Description
    de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.urlresolution  

    • Uses of ViewerPath in de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.urlresolution

      Methods in de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.urlresolution that return types with arguments of type ViewerPath 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Optional<ViewerPath> ViewerPathBuilder.createPath(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest)
      Returns the request path of the given httpRequest as a ViewerPath, including information on associated CMSPage and targeted PageType If the url has a pretty-url context and only consists of the server url, "/index" is appended to the url to redirect to the index pretty-mapping Any occurrences of "index.(x)html" are removed from the url to get the actual pretty url
      static java.util.Optional<ViewerPath> ViewerPathBuilder.createPath(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, java.lang.String baseUrl) 
      static java.util.Optional<ViewerPath> ViewerPathBuilder.createPath(java.lang.String applicationUrl, java.lang.String applicationName, java.lang.String serviceUrl)
      Create a combined path from the given url.
      static java.util.Optional<ViewerPath> ViewHistory.getCurrentView(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Retrieves the stored currentPath from the session associated the the passed request
      static java.util.Optional<ViewerPath> ViewHistory.getPreviousView(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Retrieves the stored previousPath from the session associated the the passed request
      Methods in de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.urlresolution with parameters of type ViewerPath 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ViewHistory.setCurrentView(ViewerPath currentPath, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Saves the given currentPath to the session map, keeping the previously stored currentPath as previousPath if it has a different PageType than the current path The path stored as currentPath can be retrieved by ViewHistory.getCurrentView(ServletRequest); the previously stored path can be retrieved by ViewHistory.getPreviousView(ServletRequest)
      Constructors in de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.urlresolution with parameters of type ViewerPath 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewerPath(ViewerPath blueprint)
      Creates an exact copy of the passed blueprint.
